snippet.title: Palia | Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Celebrate the holidays with Palia... on your Nintendo Switch! ⛄ Palia is officially coming your way on December 14, 2023. 🎉 Check out the gameplay trailer and pre-order now at the Nintendo eShop! https://palia.info/NintendoSwitch

Live the cozy adventure of your dreams in a breathtaking new world. Explore a vibrant land full of wonder and charm as you build a life and home for yourself with Palia, a free-to-play cozy MMO game. 

For more info, visit https://palia.com

Keep in touch and join our communities!
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/playpalia
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playpalia/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playPaIia/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playpalia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playPalia  

#PlayPalia #Palia #CozyGames #CozyMMO
